title: Gizli Saklı
overview: Naz lives with her mother and uncle, she is newly graduated from the police academy and is a protective character. The police force, after a mafia boss named Tarık Koşuoğlu, decides to use Naz and the crazy police officer Pamir together for a secret mission. Like a newly married couple, Pamir and Naz will move across the mafia family's house and gain Tarık Kosuoglu's trust and bring him to justice...
